alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 5:05PM EDT until July 30 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 504 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Woodville, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Ralford Greenway, Apalachee Regional Park, Cody, Miccosukee Road Greenway, Chaires Crossroads, Baum, Capitola, St. Marks Headwaters Greenway, Killearn Estates, Chaires, Wacissa, Lloyd and Wacissa Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
